text:
ChatGPT knows more about me than anyone else.

This prompt slapped me right in the face:

____

Don't search online. 
Only use your memory from our past chat history.

☑ What am I doing exceptionally well, few people can?

☑ What am I doing wrong that once done right could change my life?

Avoid fluff, flattery & sycophancy findings.

1. Think deeply. Take your time. Go through our entire chat history.
2. Regroup your findings in groups like a data analyst. 
3. Draw conclusions of the exceptional & the wrong.

Be direct. Cold. Straightforward. 
Don't waste tokens on sugarcoating.

____

You must use ChatGPT-o3 + the memory feature.

If you don't know how to do it, I made this guide:

go to → https://lnkd.in/dA3FGZjc
